website_summaries.verdict: Contains a heavy-duty cast brass mount body that should give you a good lifespan.
pros: Includes an ASSE approved vacuum breaker
Nice flow rate of 4 gallons per minute
Dual-handle design to easily adjust hot and cold water
Rough chrome finish will look nice in most kitchen decor situations
Installation is easier than you might think
cons: Some parts of the faucet extend quite a ways from the wall

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with faucet, after shipping problem which Amason quickly corrected. Installation was fairly simple as I was replacing an exiisting faucet. One nice thing is that Delta ships ALL the parts you'll need for installation, so that you don't have to visit the hardware store for missing ansillary parts. As this is an exterior faucet get back to me inext year for a performance evaluation as its only been inplace for a couple of week. Up to now very pleased
customer_reviews.author: William McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucet - great flow
customer_reviews.text: Not for use in California where water usage is illegal, but here in the state of Wisconsin where water is plentiful this works great for washing the car in the garage and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First off, I was impressed with the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, I was impressed with the quality of the product. Next installation was a breeze, but only time will tell if it will hold up to the use it will get. This is a bucket filling, washing station in our floral shop. This will be the fourth Faucet in 15 years. Big mistake was we kept same brand for replacement each time expecting different results. This is much heavier built and is a commerical quality!!!!
customer_reviews.author: icando

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and extremely happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Installed in the garage to hook up hose to wash my dogs. Had a plumber install it and was easy to do. Extremely sturdy! Love this faucet!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E.

customer_reviews.title: h e a v y  d u t a
customer_reviews.text: cant beat heavy duty delta. not shiney polished, but abrasive blasted and nickel plated last for decades delta
customer_reviews.author: Joy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need for a mop sink at a coffeshop. Best price I’ve found
customer_reviews.author: TulipMadness

customer_reviews.title: Really a great faucet. I put it in my garage and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really a great faucet. I put it in my garage and put aluminum diamond plate behind it. Looks great. The quality is excellent. I threaded 2- half inch galvanized pipe nipples into the back of the faucet and drilled holes through the header joist and into my basement.
customer_reviews.author: this game looks so fun

customer_reviews.title: Made strong
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for garages when you want to hook a hose up for hot water.
customer_reviews.author: S Busch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price. The company is also great and they shipped the product before the expected time. I will recommend this for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Oudat

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, super duty faucet. Has a vintage look but with modern updates .. will probably last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Popsi

customer_reviews.title: Replacment for old leaky faucet.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed to replace the old faucet that was on there.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Plasencio

customer_reviews.title: Practical and trendy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look for my mudroom. Also so practical as it has a bucket hook and a hose attachment. Love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Fleenor

customer_reviews.title: Very good product I am using it in my mop sink
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I am using it in my mop sink. Only thing is it’s not long enough. That’s why four star.
customer_reviews.author: Faruq Jafri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and work as described. Great addition to exterior of house.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Check to see if it will go with the size sink you have.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it was way too big for the sink. It might have been a good faucet but it stuck out too far into the utility sink.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep on truck as spare Delta always has performed for me
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: I need my foucet
customer_reviews.text: Box show up with no foucet and open tried to call the foucet company I was on hold for 45 minutes and they never pick up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for a bathroom...
customer_reviews.text: Took ALOT OF WORK to be used as a bathroom faucet. The anti siphon fitting had to be removed because it was too long for my sink. It was torqued on sooo unbelievably tight. Delta service was absolutely zero help. Took them 2 weeks to contact me back. But it does look nice now
customer_reviews.author: will stuard

customer_reviews.title: bad faucet
customer_reviews.text: start leaking after 2 months, then i have to replace internal parts every 2 months. i do not recommend this one to any one
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Althowaini

product_meta.title: Delta Faucet 28T9, Rough Chrome
feature_bullets: Heavy duty cast brass wall mount service sink faucet with integral stops
